name: UPTOYOU
title: Martketplace Open source
description: This project has been carried out as a final project of Ironhack bootcamp (14 days term). It is a multi-store Marketplace where any user can start selling. Register/login, listings, filters and categories, listing pages, shopping cart, add product, edit, delete.

name: CUB3D
title: The first FPS game with raycasting technique.
description: This project has been done as an 42Madrid project. It is inspired by the world-famous game, considered the first FPS ever made. It will allow you to explore the ray-casting technique. The objective will be to create a dynamic view within a map, in which to observe different textures for walls, objects, etc.

name: BIZZDASH
title: Businees dashboard.
description: This project has been done as an Ironhack bootcamp project (within 7 days). Allows users to create and share their professional profiles. Includes a personalized dashboard with jobs and offers information. It is a single page application, so in a single view you can create, edit and view your profile.

name: SHINOBI-GAME
title: Free style recreation of the mythical platform game Shinobi
description: This project has been done as an Ironhack bootcamp project (within 7 days). It is a free style recreation of the mythical platform game Shinobi with Canvas, JavaScritp, HTML5 and CSS. You can play on mi github.
